name: lern

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxr, crn(cle))
-| wss(cxr, crn(cle))
-| wss(crn(cle), cxr)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℝ* = ran(≤)
⊣ ℝ* ⊆ ran(≤)
⊣ ran(≤)⊆ ℝ*
